replies.body: Ayy is riot hinting that my boy yi is gonna get a rework this season? His kit is really really outdated

from the time I've played with the new swain I already think he needs a nerf...
his ''death's hand'' ability cooldown is too short and with champions that have low health and low/no mobility it makes the lane extremely difficult as he can easily spam it and his ult shouldn't give him as much health as it does because he can quickly go from barely any health to full health is a matter of just seconds{{champion:50}} please fix :(

=/ yet another patch goes by without {{champion:266}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:83}} being viable in ranked. Like cmon not EVERYONE likes playing a tank in top lane. There was a class called bruisers, that you first didn't do a mini class rework, like tanks and assassins got,  didn't give a keystone and have been dodging it for 4 months now. 
Time to learn ADC I guess...
Oh yeah and to give you a summary, this patch 5 mid laners changed, 3 junglers changed, 3 ad carries changed, 0 sups changed and 1 top laner

So I go in game and I notice that I can't see my ping/ms in the top-right corner, under my kda and stats like it usually is. Check the patch notes and doesn't say anything about it. Can someone explain to me because I want to know exactly how much lag I'm getting every game. Thnaks
So many nerfs this patch. I want to see some buffs on champions like Amumu and Nami

You guys forgot to put in the new ability videos on Swain's ability page. I know you've done this many times before. You also need to update very, very old skin splashes, like Black Alistar, Nightmare Chogath, Union Jack Fiddlesticks etc.
Both Xayah and Rakan can get a new skin, but no Dark Star Aurelion Sol or Anivia?? Since when did you make skins for champions that are brand new??

Another Lux skin?? Majority of Lux players I see have the ultimate skin. I don't get why they'd spend more money on her. A few years, and still waiting for an old champion like Rumble to have his FOURTH skin.
I saw on the LoL Facebook page that viktor was getting a buff to his "e" as well, is this true?
Can't wait for Rengar's Q revent

RIP old Swain.

New Swain should have just been made as a new champion, or an update to Vlad, as it seems to have more in common with Vlad than it does old Swain.

I rate this patch 1/10.

I was waiting for the Rengar revert, but the instant I saw the Patch Highlights....
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
